main.blocks:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables></variables>
  <block type="pxt-on-start" x="67" y="19">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="Mbit_IR_init">
        <field name="pin">Pins.P8</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="Mbit_IR_received_event" x="726" y="22">
    <field name="btn">RemoteButton.TLeft</field>
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="Tinybit_CarCtrlSpeed">
        <field name="index">Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinLeft</field>
        <value name="speed">
          <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
            <mutation min="0" max="255" label="Speed"></mutation>
            <field name="SLIDER">80</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="device_pause">
            <value name="pause">
              <shadow type="timePicker">
                <field name="ms">100</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="Tinybit_CarCtrl">
                <field name="index">Tinybit.CarState.Car_Stop</field>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="device_forever" x="465" y="56">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="basic_show_icon">
        <field name="i">IconNames.Heart</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="Mbit_IR_received_event" x="1177" y="20">
    <field name="btn">RemoteButton.NUM1</field>
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="device_play_note">
        <value name="note">
          <shadow type="device_note">
            <field name="name">262</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <value name="duration">
          <shadow type="device_beat">
            <field name="fraction">BeatFraction.Whole</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="Mbit_IR_received_event" x="63" y="186">
    <field name="btn">RemoteButton.Power</field>
    <statement name="HANDLER">

        <field name="value">Tinybit.enColor.OFF</field>

    </statement>
  </block>

  <block type="Mbit_IR_received_event" x="835" y="528">
    <field name="btn">RemoteButton.BEEP</field>
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="device_ring">
        <value name="note">
          <shadow type="device_note">
            <field name="name">988</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="device_pause">
            <value name="pause">
              <shadow type="timePicker">
                <field name="ms">400</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="device_rest">
                <value name="duration">
                  <shadow type="device_beat">
                    <field name="fraction">BeatFraction.Sixteenth</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
